Text: Re PayPal paymentPST did this change recently I have done several transactions without a problem I understood the verification only mattered if I ever transacted an agregate of I will double check that but you should not have a problem getting the funds Jaime Original Message From Love Phillip M PhillipM NRONcom To Sent Wednesday January AM Subject PayPal payment FYI not sure if you know this yet but you need to become verified on PayPal before your payment can go through This usually entails you getting the two amounts from your bank account that they drafted usually pennies Once you are verified I will receive the funds and I will mail out the cube Thanks PL This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Enron Cube Auction on EBay Cc PST Shipping it is fine Thanks for the deal Jaime J Rocha El Paseo Houston Texas Original Message From To Sent Thursday January AM Subject RE Enron Cube Auction on EBay would you prefer me mailing or delivering personally to you I was planning on shipping this afternoon Just let me know I will be out of the office tomorrow Let me know whatever you prefer PL Original Message From Jaime Rocha ENRON Sent Wednesday January AM To Love Phillip M Cc Subject Re Enron Cube Auction on EBay Philip I made a Paypal payment this morning All the shipping information on the system is accurate I also work downtown if that would be more convenient Jaime Original Message From Love Phillip M PhillipM NRONcom To Sent Tuesday January AM Subject Enron Cube Auction on EBay Congratulations on winning the auction on Ebay for the Enron values cube Please let me know if you will be paying by PayPal or money ordercashiers check The total is I will need your mailing address as well I will mail the balls priority mail as soon as I receive payment Thanks again and use this email address if you reply before this evening is my home email and I can not access it from work Thanks again and look forward to hearing from you soon PL This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
